text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: Solarus is a Free and open-source software cross-platform Game engine for developing 2D computer graphics. It has been designed to power Action role-playing games, though, are not limited. The engine is written in C++ and uses Lua (programming language) as its scripting language. It is published under the GNU General Public License.
